meanings.sent1: The starers in the room made me feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The starers were gathered around, watching the performance intently.
meanings.sent3: The starers at the zoo were the animals, not the visitors!
meanings.sent4: The starers in the painting seemed to follow you wherever you went.
meanings.sent5: The starers in the dark alley gave me chills down my spine.

meanings.sent1: Avoid the starers on the bus; they can make you feel self-conscious.
meanings.sent2: The starers in the crowd were making the speaker nervous.
meanings.sent3: The starers at the party were trying to figure out the magician's trick.
meanings.sent4: The starers in the movie theater were so engrossed, they didn't notice the fire alarm.
meanings.sent5: The starers on the beach were watching the sunset in awe.
